LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_NormalChild.title: The Elven Village Child
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_NormalChild.baseDescrip: [PAWN_nameDef] spent his childhood in a small Elven village as [PAWN_pronoun].
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_SlaveChild.title: Elven Child Slave
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_SlaveChild.baseDescript: [PAWN_nameDef] has a history of being captured and traded as a [PAWN_pronoun].
